templates.name: Strides 6×20s
templates.description_template: Easy run at {e_pace}, then 6×20s strides. Accelerate smoothly to ~90% effort over 15-20 seconds, hold 5 seconds, decelerate. Walk back to start. Stay relaxed.
templates.hypothesis: Short accelerations maintain neuromuscular coordination and leg speed without significant fatigue accumulation.
templates.validation_criteria: RPE stays low (3-5), no residual fatigue next day, turnover feels crisp
templates.rationale: Strides preserve fast-twitch recruitment during aerobic-focused training without glycolytic stress.
notes: Focus on quick, light turnover - not max effort

templates.name: Hill Sprints 8×10s
templates.structure: 8×10s max effort hill sprints, walk down recovery
templates.description_template: Easy run at {e_pace}, then find a steep hill (8-12% grade). 8×10s MAX effort sprints, walk down for full recovery. Focus on driving arms and high knees.
templates.hypothesis: Short, maximal hill efforts build power and running-specific strength without excessive volume stress.
templates.validation_criteria: Power output maintained across reps, no quad/glute soreness lasting >24 hours
templates.rationale: Hill sprints develop force production capacity that transfers to late-race power.
notes: These are TRUE max effort - not threshold

templates.name: Threshold Intervals 2×10
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: 2×10min at {t_pace} with 2min easy jog recovery. Cool down 1mi easy. Comfortably hard - you could speak in short phrases.
templates.hypothesis: Introduction to threshold work with sufficient recovery to maintain quality.
templates.validation_criteria: Able to hit pace for both intervals, HR stable, RPE 6-7
templates.rationale: Entry-level threshold that builds confidence before longer intervals.

templates.name: Threshold Intervals 3×10
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: 3×10min at {t_pace} with 2min easy jog recovery. Cool down 1mi easy. Comfortably hard - you could speak in short phrases.
templates.hypothesis: Extended threshold volume builds lactate clearance capacity.
templates.validation_criteria: All three intervals at target pace, HR drift <5% across set, RPE 6-8
templates.rationale: Core threshold work that extends time at threshold without excessive fatigue.

templates.name: Threshold Intervals 2×15
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: 2×15min at {t_pace} with 3min easy jog recovery. Cool down 1mi easy. This is a progression from 3×10 - longer sustained efforts.
templates.hypothesis: Longer threshold intervals extend lactate tolerance and mental stamina.
templates.validation_criteria: Pace maintained for full 15min intervals, RPE rises but manageable
templates.rationale: Progresses interval duration while maintaining total quality minutes.

templates.name: Threshold Run 20min
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: 20min continuous at {t_pace}. Cool down 1mi easy. This is threshold (T) — comfortably hard, controlled, not a race.
templates.hypothesis: Continuous threshold builds sustained lactate-clearance capacity and pacing discipline.
templates.validation_criteria: Even pacing throughout, HR stays stable, finishes feeling 'one more mile possible'
templates.rationale: Continuous threshold is a different stimulus than cruise intervals — no breaks, more pacing control.

templates.name: Threshold Run 25min
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: 25min continuous at {t_pace}. Cool down 1mi easy. Stay controlled; this should feel like you could hold it longer if you had to.
templates.hypothesis: Extended continuous threshold builds race-like sustained effort while staying below redline.
templates.validation_criteria: Pacing stays even or slight negative split, RPE 7-8

templates.name: Goal Pace 4mi
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: 4mi at {m_pace}. Cool down 1mi easy. This should feel controlled, not hard - practice race-day pacing and form.
templates.hypothesis: Goal pace work locks in race-day rhythm and builds pace confidence.
templates.validation_criteria: Pace feels sustainable, HR appropriate for effort, could continue further
templates.rationale: Dress rehearsal for race day - same pace you'll run in the race.

templates.name: Goal Pace 5mi
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: 5mi at {m_pace}. Cool down 1mi easy. Extended goal pace work - should still feel controlled.
templates.hypothesis: Extended goal pace builds stamina at race rhythm.
templates.validation_criteria: Even pacing, feels sustainable, confidence high
templates.rationale: Progression from 4mi - builds endurance at goal pace.

templates.name: Sharpening 6×200m
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: 6×200m at {r_pace} with 200m easy jog recovery. Cool down 1mi easy. Short and sharp - stay relaxed.
templates.hypothesis: Short, fast reps maintain speed without accumulating fatigue pre-race.
templates.validation_criteria: Feels crisp and quick, no lingering fatigue, legs feel alive
templates.rationale: Taper sharpening - maintains neuromuscular readiness without volume stress.

templates.name: Fartlek Pyramid
templates.structure: 1-2-3-2-1 min pyramid @ T-effort, equal jog recovery
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: Fartlek pyramid - 1min, 2min, 3min, 2min, 1min at threshold effort with equal time easy jog between. Cool down 1mi easy.
templates.hypothesis: Varied interval lengths provide mental variety and mixed stimulus.
templates.validation_criteria: All intervals at appropriate effort, enjoyable workout, RPE 6-8
templates.rationale: Psychological variety with structured quality - breaks monotony of fixed intervals.

templates.name: Cruise Intervals 5×5
templates.description_template: Warm up 2mi easy. Main set: 5×5min at {t_pace} with 1min easy jog recovery. Cool down 1mi easy. Shorter recovery than other threshold work - builds fitness accumulation.
templates.hypothesis: Short recovery intervals accumulate more time near threshold with controlled stress.
templates.validation_criteria: Pace maintained across all 5, HR rises but controllable, RPE 6-7
templates.rationale: Alternative threshold structure - same total time, different recovery pattern.
